news_header: White House Press Representative Levitt states that the White House aims to prevent the media from spreading false information. The AP news agency has been denied access to White House press conferences three times due to its refusal to refer to the Gulf of Mexico as the Gulf of America.
news_original_title: Uutistoimisto kieltäytyi kutsumasta Meksikonlahtea Amerikanlahdeksi, toimittajat eivät pääse Valkoiseen taloon
news_text: Levitt insists that the waters of Louisiana are indeed called the Gulf of America. AP's editor-in-chief, Julie Pace, criticized the White House's bans as detrimental to the public's access to neutral reporting.
